entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8602 in child class when in the construtor ensures the value of base class property won't be null #65753

Closed

  • Can't use C# LangVersion 1 w/ Roslyn (only version 2 onwards) #65751
  • Update `Xunit.Combinatorial` version #65754
  • Add a code fix to suggest adding `partial` modifier #61611
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into 'PrimaryConstructors' #65755
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65752
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Add "Make type partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move repo to newer version of Public Api analyzers #65737
    Area-Analyzers, Next

Updated

  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dotnet5 feed #65742
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
